radiographic_examinations.findings: 2 subcentimeter hypodensities within the liver likely represent cysts or biliary hamartomas. An approximately 8.0 cm segment of sigmoid colon exhibits diffuse wall thickening and adjacent fat stranding, consistent with diverticulitis. There is an intramural focal fluid collection measuring 1.6 x 1.5 cm, compatible with an intramural abscess. No pneumoperitoneum. A 8 x 6 mm asymmetric oval right breast soft tissue density.
